title: Drawing, "Design for a Creamer", 1943
medium: Pen and black, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, center right: 163
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: CREMERA/DIAMETRE 7 cms 1/2/HAUTEUR 9 cms; lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/43
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cylindrical creamer with a flared spout drawn in plan and elevation with applied vertical bands along the back third of the body, sumounted by a circular lid decorated along the front with five applied balls; C-shaped handle indicated in red ink decorated on each side with three protruding balls  at the top and bottom where it connects to the short circular foot. Underdrawing in graphite of creamer in golden section. Circumference of the body drawn twice in plan.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for a Creamer", 1943.
1943. Pen and black, red ink, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-66.
